Text: how do i use the subs wont work??
what is a good program to open this with?

ok i found a good way to get it working
1. open media player classic
2. press: file -> open DVD and choose where the VIDEO_TS folder is
3. enjoy

quality is realy good, it's just the storyline that is a bit messed up xD
